title: View or disconnect the current data connections
answer:
Pull down the status bar to check if the data switch is highlighted. 

1If the data switch is highlighted ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110053), it means the switch is enabled; the switch will become gray ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110054)after being clicked. At this time, you can disconnect the data link. 

2If the data switch becomes gray ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110055), it means the switch is disabled; the switch will become highlighted ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110056)after being clicked. At this time, you can connect the data link.
